byline.contributor: Nicholas St. Fleur contributed reporting to this article

lead_paragraph: Skywatchers in South America and Africa tweeted their experiences on Sunday, though some complained that overcast weather dampened their views.
snippet: Skywatchers in South America and Africa tweeted their experiences on Sunday, though some complained that overcast weather dampened their views....

headline.main: ‘Ring of Fire’ Eclipse Travels Across South America and Africa
headline.print_headline: Ring of Fire: A Shadow Over South America and Africa
